Headline: Purple Line Delays
ShortDescription: Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Central. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Central. 

 Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
